It’s working but slightly old and then after being exposed to the summer heat in the mail the battery gets damaged? Think about that before you put your smart phone in the mail.

After sending in my device, then BuyBackBoss(BBB) sends me a message saying that they will only give me $1 down from $200. I was not pleased and had to request several times to return the device. They finally decided to give me the original price. I did get the funds but will not use them anymore.

Was very disappointed with the review and value of my phone. Phone was kept in case and in very good condition but only given “Fair” condition. Could’ve gotten more through Verizon but didn’t want to go through hassle of getting it shipped back. So took the low end of $68.00 for an iPhone 7. Used this through recommendation of a friend. First and last time.

Sub-par service. They give little detail in what they considered "damaged" or "broken" and after I was quoted $110 for two iPhone 6s, they reduced my quote down to $40 due to what they consider "severe frame damage" even though Apple offered $50 for the phone as is. I will not be using this service again and I don't recommend anyone to offer them business.**UPDATE**This company did give me the quoted price as a courtesy, which I greatly appreciate.

Review.Titre: Actual offer was $20 less than quote
Review.Contenu: Actual offer was $20 less than quote. Been in the cell phone business for over 10 years. I know the value & resale quality of cell phones. Seems you nickel & dime your way to profits. Cannot recommend to my business clients.

I went to Apple to sell my phones, and they offered me $215 each ($430 total) as both phones looked to be in "like new" condition. The only issue was the Battery life was 84%. Apple offered us "Apple Gift Cards" vs. cash. I then went to BuyBackBoss and others, and BuyBackBoss offered me $220 for each phone - cash - so we sent our phones to BuyBackBoss. Upon checking our phones, they said that our 1 phone had issues with the vibrate function as well as several deep scratches. The phone did not have deep scratches when we sent it, and the vibrate function was not an issue per Apple's inspection 3 days prior. I can't help but feel like this is a dishonest business practice of BuyBackBoss, but it is the risk we take when we send our phones to a service like this.

Quoted $220 for my ~3 week old, like new Pixel 4a.  When they got it, the offer mysteriously went down by $30 because there were "micro scratches" on the screen.  Nope.  But, now that they have your phone, you get to weigh the hassle of asking them to return it (is that free, I wonder) against the $190 they're now offering.  My suspicion is that this happens all the time and is 'baked in' to their business model to boost income.  They probably get plenty of people who misrepresent the condition of their devices either intentionally or not, but I confess their implication that I lied about my phone stung.  Yes, I took the $190, but won't be using them again.

Review.Titre: Payment reduced & funding kind of slow
Review.Contenu: Disappointed to have the condition of my phone downgraded (from "mint" to "good"), along with a 40 dollar reduction in buyback amount.  Also, time to receive funds vs date phone was sent (14 days).

Review.Titre: Got the money but it was a fight
Review.Contenu: In the end I got the amount that was originally promised, but I had to argue with customer service to receive it.I was honest that my phone was damaged. The “damaged” category specified a non functional microphone or speakers and the microphone on the iPhone 7 was not working. Buyback Boss offered $100 for it.After I sent it in I received an email stating that because they microphone wasn’t working for a specific reason they would only offer $30. After some back and forth I sent a screen shot of the buyback boss website where it states that broken microphones count as “damaged” and not “broken” and they offered the $100 originally quoted price. I will not do business with buyback boss again.

Review.Titre: Quote and amount paid are vastly different...
Review.Contenu: The amount paid was far, far less than the amount quoted. There were issues they found that I had not experienced, but regardless, it should not have been a $240 difference.

Review.Titre: An offer is made and then reduced
Review.Contenu: An offer is made and then reduced. Sounds suspicious and untrustworthy. Hard to feel good about being taken advantage of.
Customer service was okay. Process was disappointing.
Pretty disappointed took almost 4 days to get my money normally I get it the same day it’s delivered or maybe the next
Bait and switch.  Gave me one price then came back and basically gave me nothing.  By then it was too late.

Review.Titre: I could have gotten more for my phone …
Review.Contenu: I could have gotten more for my phone with a different service, I wish I had used the other service.

I wanted to sell my old iPhone quickly and without hassle. My screen needed to be replaced as it sometimes would not light up and I’m not someone who would be capable of replacing it on my own. I put in specification of the condition of the phone which was pretty good I always had it in an otter box case it was almost scratch free except for a tiny Knick or two on the side mot the screen. After putting in the condition and an explanation of the phone and the issue it had I was quoted somewhere around 115 if I recall. I sent out the phone fully charged and reset. After they received it they emailed me and said the phone doesn’t turn on even after charging it so they were now offering me 38$ after they already had it. The phone was fully charged and the phone did turn on and I had pictures of the phone on in full working condition the screen not lighting up was not something that happened all the time. I feel like this company basically quotes one way and then just tells everyone their phone doesn’t work because at that point is the person really going to send it back and then try to sell it again? Probably not. I feel like I got scammed and I would not recommend anyone use this company to sell back their phone I think they would be better off going on eBay or marketplace.*in response to the company response below. They say “just like I said the device sometimes does not turn on”. I explained already that it does turn on it just needs a screen replacement. That is a big difference from being damaged which the screen is to completely broken and not functioning. I do stand by this review and I will not recommend anyone uses this route to get rid of an unwanted phone.

Review.Titre: Process is long and payments are low
Free shipping both ways is the best thing about them!
Review.Contenu: Free shipping both ways is the best part of the deal.  Service was somewhat slow as it took them 5 days to “evaluate” my EUC phone that always had a glass screen protector installed and lived inside of a leather wallet type case.  Anyway, they didn’t agree with my condition assessment, so I asked them to send it back (which they did after 3 higher revised offers, before I told them it wasn’t about the money, it was about their process and high promise low delivery business methods)I will not use them again as the entire process took too long and I felt they used bait and switch tactics to lower their price paid.

Review.Titre: On the plus side they were easy to work…
Review.Contenu: On the plus side they were easy to work with.  My phone wasn't unlocked, and they were patient as I worked to get it that way.  One the down side they downgraded the quality of the phone and paid less for it.  I couldn't see any scratches at all on it, but they claimed there were some.

Review.Titre: After shipping my phone they claimed…something different.
Review.Contenu: After shipping my phone they claimed damage and offer me substantially less than the quote.  When I protested, they basically said take it or leave it.  Pretty disappointing.  Next time I'll use one of the larger companies, because even though the initial quote may be lower, I know it will be real.

The good: they were communicative and quickly responded to my inquiries. They also quoted me the highest price for my iPhone 12 Pro.The bad: after I sent in my phone and they received/inspected it, they claimed that my back camera was broken and offered me less than half of my original offer. I knew this was not true. I told them I knew this wasn’t true and asked them to send it back. All of a sudden they realized that my back camera was in fact functioning correctly and said they would pay the original quoted payout, and which they promptly did. This is the second company I’ve worked with that try to first low ball you to see if you’re too lazy to deal with sending it out to another company. Feels a bit shady.

Review.Titre: They changed the offer with no proof
Review.Contenu: My phone was in impecable condition and they said it had scratches, the phone has always had protectors and is in excellent new condition. I fel cheated.

Good communication back and forth. Not happy that PayPal deducted fees for the payment. Took less then original quote do to phone was on a att account before I purchased as a financed phone? Took buybackboss negotiated fee to unlock phone. Worked it out with my loss of $40

Review.Titre: The price should be as estimated
Review.Contenu: The price should be as estimated, Not less than 1/2. Wonder if Apple is so critical. It did help me to declutter a bit, with some change in pocket. Overall decent experience.

Edit: Way too many emails for this simple transaction. Please review the number of emails you send once you have received the phone. While I did get a decent price it took longer than it should have, IMO. The only real complaint was that even after my phone had been received they just kept sending shipping instructions the whole duration. It was an annoying process.

Review.Titre: The Process Takes Longer Than Advertised
Review.Contenu: Service was solid, but timeline is exaggerated in any/all advertising.  I had to continually contact support to see what the status was and while they were super friendly, polite, and helpful... proactive communication would have been nice. Initially, I was told that payment would potentially be received "in as little as 2 days" but the process took a full two weeks.  The initial price estimate is also exaggerated; they don't mention that there is a 2-5 day examination period for each phone and that the final buyback price is likely to be 30% or less of what their online estimate states.

Process was reasonably seamless however the grading process appears designed to reduce payouts and I suspect this a customary business practice. I submitted a phone that was essentially brand new looking with far less wear and tear than would be expected, but was told it was not as I described. Be prepared for this if you select this buyer as you no longer will have the phone in your possession.

Review.Titre: I sold them 2 iPhones - great result
Review.Contenu: UPDATE:After reading my review, I was contact by them & they explained the reason on the SE further.  Since I have done business with them in the past, they graciously offered to sent me a check for the $100 difference in order to keep my future business.  Very good customer service.  I recommend them highly.PREVIOU REVIEW:I sold them 2 iPhones.  First an iPhone 13 Pro Max. The payment for that phone which cost $1,199.99.  I was quoted $719.82 and I got $701.00 due to some small scratches at the bottom of the phone.  Second an iPhone se 2020 which cost $449.99.  I was quoted $111 but only got $11 due to a battery issue which seems odd since it was less than 2 years old.  A disappointment.

Review.Titre: I sent 3 phones and they found reasons…
Review.Contenu: I sent 3 phones and they found reasons to reduce values by over 50%. Likely wont use again.

Review.Titre: Speed and service was 5 star, but not appraisal!
Review.Contenu: Speed and service was 5 star.  Wasn't pleased with appraisal of my phones.  They stayed in protected cases and screen protectors the entire time we owned them and even shipped them in the cases.  Only got about half of the buy back $'s than what was originally stated with phones in "good" condition.  Their trade-in estimates just lure you in to use them.  Expect to only get half and make your decision from there.

Review.Titre: I am giving them a 3 because the…
Review.Contenu: I am giving them a 3 because the decision made on a tiny pixelation was questionable and it reduced significantly the original offered made. Otherwise the communication via email and check delivery were on point.

I have an iPhone 7 that was in mint condition. They offered me $80 for it. When they got it they said that the battery was bad and only offered me 40. The battery was adequate, I had been using the phone and I know that the battery held for hours. I knew when I mailed it off to them that they were going to do this, it’s so easy for them to do. I would never use them ever again.

Review.Titre: My phone was delivered the Friday…
Review.Contenu: My phone was delivered the Friday before Presidents Holiday, so I waited to see if I got info., 2 weeks went by and until I inquired about my phone and sent photos of the delivery receipt nothing was happening, but then I received a check within 1 week.  But they cut me $10 without explanation as to why, so I feel like that is a standard ploy.  I will use a different service next time.

This was a good find.  I was a bit taken back that the price of the buy back was lowered when they received the product.   The phone from the moment of purchase to being sent back had an Otter case and then a similar style.  The phone was sent back in the case.   But it was worth not having to toss in the garbage.   The next order will be several phones for a client/friend.

I received a buy back quote of $35 but once the phone was shipped and received, the quote dropped to $3.  Feels a little disingenuous.  Maybe the quoting process should be a little more detailed. While my phone did not have the original glass screen, the quote should not have dropped $32.

Whatever you're offered after your initial description, be prepared to receive less.  They purposefully leave their descriptions vague so they can nitpick your actual device and offer you less money.  Hold your ground though and be patient as they counter offer.  You can get pretty close to what you're offered initially.

While Buyback Boss makes the process of selling your phone(s) easy, they do not explain a few things. Please note if you have an Apple phone and used Verizon insurance (Asurion) to fix it, the value of your phone is reduced drastically. My iPhone X was in perfect condition, but since I had a problem with a screen and Asurion sent me a new one, the value decreased by approximately $200.00.

Not an Iphone. Moto Z3 Play with extra mem card. They initially offered 40. Once they received it with all original packaging and accessories, they offered me 25 saying the case was damaged and screen ghosting. I knew this wasn't entirely right so I asked them to send it back to me. They did, minus the sim card and extra memory card that i purchased. They have now promptly reimbursed me for the missing mem card.

Coincidentally my face recognition software was not working once they received my phone and only offered $55 for it. I, of course, had no recourse and was given the option to accept the reduced price of $55 and not really even advised what the policy would be of them returning my phone.Update: after posting this review, i was contacted and offered the original amount for my phone. So, I increased the rating from 1 to 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Disappointed to receive an offer back…
Review.Contenu: Disappointed to receive an offer back of less than what was originally quoted after Buyback Boss received my phone.  Reason was: phone was chipped/cracked.  I don't recall there being any crack on the phone but after the company sent me a picture of the phone, I decided to accept the new offer.

Review.Titre: Don't be surprised if your quote is adjusted down.
Review.Contenu: The initial price quote was the highest by far. However, when Buyback Boss ran tests it turned out there was an issue with the vibration function on my iPhone and the price was adjusted down. I don't recall an issue but maybe there was.  Please supply customers a list of functions to check before we ship our phones that way expectations are realistic... and publish stats to show the difference between quotes and actual prices paid and why the difference. Transparency builds trust.

Review.Titre: Sent back an iphone 8 plus in excellent…
Review.Contenu: Sent back an iphone 8 plus in excellent condition. Was given an estimate of $210.00. BuyBack only paid $165.00, claiming that phone was not as expected. This phone was evaluated before it was sent in to BuyBack, and was given an excellent rating. No explanation from Buyback as to why they devalued the phone.

My experience at first was top notch. BBB is very responsive and make it incredibly easy and fair to sell your phone. The only problem is it's been about 2 weeks now and I haven't seen my money. I asked that it be paid through PayPal and for some reason PP put a 21 day hold on me receiving the money. I don't know why but I find myself wondering now if this whole thing was a scam. If I get my money I will come back and update this reveiw. signed, WorriedUPDATE: Buyback Boss contacted me and offered to Fed Ex my check to me instead of going through PayPal. Got the check. Brittney was amazing. This company is LEGIT!!!

Using their criteria, I assessed my phone as being worth $80. BBBoss assessed the phone and said it was only worth $35. I told them I can get at least $70 on Decluttr and to just send the phone back to me. They then said... oh OK we'll give you $77 instead. Really? This is a rip off move if I ever saw one! I did take the $77 just to be done with it. But why do you need to play like that???!!

I was happy with the offer which was great but not to pleased that it took so long to check in my phone, I had to reach out several times in order to see why my phone wasn't checked in after being received over a week. Brittney was great and finally had my phone processed and payment sent.

Experience was a ok. It took some time to get the right box for shipping. When I described my phones to get my quote I went by their guide for an estimated price. After they received the items they sent me an email saying that the phones weren’t in the condition that I said. Basically I was offered less money or they could send the phones back. It would have been more work and hassle (time) to have them sent back and go through the process with another company so I settled for less money.

Review.Titre: overall it was a decent experience
Review.Contenu: overall it was a decent experience.  My husband and I used $10 credit codes but neither of us were given the extra $10 even though it appeared when we checked out.  Also, they received my device and said it was scratched in the corners.  I had inspected the phone myself and found nothing prior to sending it.  I've used them plenty of times in the past without issue.  Just a little disappointed this go round.

The process to send in my phone was pretty easy and all seemed well initally. However I later found out when I received my check that I got less payment than was quoted because my phone was still logged into I cloud. I didn’t see that was a requirement when I signed up to send in my phone, I still couldn’t find the fine print when I searched the website about it.

Review.Titre: Room for improvement, but not bad…
Review.Contenu: I felt I described the condition of my device accurately given the prompts provided by Buyback Boss. Naturally, they bumped the quote down because they found a defect that wasn't specifically addressed in their prompts. I felt like this was a bit of a bait and switch. However, they were willing to ship my device back at their expense. I did suggest that they be more comprehensive regarding what constitutes "cosmetic" damage. Hopefully, they'll implement those changes soon.

I sold my macbook to this company first and it was great! Everything went so fast and I got my money within a week. When I sold my iphone back it wasn't the same. My tracking information wasn't updated. It said it hadn't been delivered when my postal service said it had been delivered. I ended up having to email them to see what was going on because it had been longer than promised and then I didn't receive an email back for a few days after. When they finally responded I received my money for my device by 5:00pm that day. Not sure why my second experience was so different.

Review.Titre: The price quoted to buy my phone was changed
Review.Contenu: The price quoted to buy my phone when I completed their form was downgraded after they received it from $60 to $14. Apple store was going to give me $50. Would not use this company again

Review.Titre: Its okay, I wouldn't use or recommend though.
Review.Contenu: Was quoted a price, then told another price, then once I accepted they took a fee.  After all these deductions it was about 20-25% less than the original quoted cost. Turn around was a bit longer than another well known service like this.  So next time, I would use the other service I've used in the past.   I added 1 star to bump it up to 2 stars because they were responsive to my emails.*updated*Added 1 star for attentive customer service.  I was contacted and offered the difference dollar amount, minus the fee of course.   I still would not use this service again regardless.  I've never had such an issue before with Gazzelle.

Been nearly a month and still have not received a check for my two phones.I've tried several times to contact Buyback and received no response.Follow up:  Brittany from BB reached out to me with an email and FedEx'd a check to me for the phones.  While I wished it hadn't travelled down this road, this review got their attention and the situation was rectified within 2 days.I will say BB made it very easy to send in the phones, gave me a good price.  The problem was on the back end.  In the end, when I'm done with my current iphones, I will give BB another chance,  As such, I changed my rating from 1 star to 3 stars.

Process was easy & quick. I did receive email that my payment was being donated per my request. However I never intended to donate. I called the same day as email received & was told change was updated & I received check within 4 days.

Review.Titre: Felt like a bait and switch...
Review.Contenu: On line they gave me an estimate of $70 for my iPhone 6s Plus; definitely higher than two other offers.  When they received it and examined it, the offer dropped to $45.  Felt like a bait and switch.

Review.Titre: I was quoted a higher buy back amount…
Review.Contenu: I was quoted a higher buy back amount on line, then after they received my phone was told they would pay me less due to a slight dent that I was unaware of.  I did decide to accept the offer rather than have it shipped back to me and to have to start over again.  Beware!I was recently contacted by Buy Back and they had read my review and decided to meet the price they had quoted me originally.  I think that was really nice of the company to try to make things right.  I am now a very pleased customer and have received a check for the difference of what they paid and what they quoted.Thank you Buy Back👍

Review.Titre: It would have been helpful to know …
Review.Contenu: It would have been helpful to know prior to mailing the device that certain things needed to be done to the account in order to receive the maximum amount for the phone. I settled for 50% of what I was promised because I could no longer access the account.

The process was easy, the pay was less than expected and you might get low balled when they receive it. One phone we sent in was claimed to have ghosting on the screen and the offer went down to $10. They did send a photo of the burnt in image which the circle shapes didn't match any wallpaper or screensaver we used. Hard to say if it was honest or not but it's better than sitting in a drawer not being useful for anyone.Update: Brittany contacted me by email to follow on my review and to ask for anys ideas I may have to improve customer experience. Seems like a company is trying to improve customer experience and be the best they can be.
Process went very smooth, they even sent a prepaid label and box for no charge.  Only downside is battery was low so price went down $100 from initial quote..  seemed a lot for a battery.
Pay way less than expected after reviewing the almost gift  out the phones, they still get money bu the parts and recycle, in other hand the service are great, verry communicative and following up

Review.Titre: Think they should have more options on…
Review.Contenu: Think they should have more options on the return process. Like you know what is wrong with your phone and they could give you an estimate on what they would give you. Not just pick one of four options.

Review.Titre: Had a wait but was made right
Review.Contenu: Had a long wait and had to track my phone order to them and email them several times to see what was going on.   They did make it right in the end which I appreciated very much.

Review.Titre: Average, because it was comparable to another disappointing buy-back service
Review.Contenu: After a disappointing experience with one buy-back service that promised big and delivered nothing and because of rave reviews, I sent an old item here.  It had been very well cared for over the years, it was old but totally functional.  I actually didn't rate it as high as I could determine from their guidelines that it was; this rating implied a promise of a certain amount.  They found a defect that was not noticeable to the average human eye and they said the device was valueless.  I suspect those giving high ratings were selling much newer less used items than what I had.  You really can't expect a well used but lovingly care for device to be absolutely perfect and I tried to allow for that in my opinion.  The question keeps running through my mind, how much will these buy-back businesses make from reselling these "valueless" items?
Buyback Boss lived up to their financial commitment to purchase my distressed iPhone but the transaction took one month longer to complete than originally estimated by them.

Review.Titre: Definitely didn't care for being quoted…
Review.Contenu: Definitely didn't care for being quoted one price and ended up only getting half. But other than that they were good with communication

Review.Titre: Phones seem to be in perfect condition
Review.Contenu: Phones seem to be in perfect condition, but yet every android I sent back seems to have the ghost image on them. Didn’t see that, so I question it
I tried to sell my xiaomi phone but they could not accept it even though it is a relatively new phone. However, customer service was good
Your system works well but the adjustment to original quotes price was annoying.  Quote lower and don't adjust your offers

Review.Titre: Check took a few weeks, not great turn around time
Review.Contenu: I was happy to find out that I could sell my iPhone 5s for a $57 profit, but waiting 3 weeks for my check was too long.

Review.Titre: Unclear method of determining payout amount
Review.Contenu: Not a very fast payout, and the whole process of determining the value for my devices was not transparent.
Average service.  CEO was responsive to issues.  He resolved the issue quickly.

Review.Titre: Never received my money for my iPhone 7.
Review.Contenu: Received my money for my iPhone 7.

Michael at BuyBackBoss was great. He responds quickly and gets my questions addressed immediately. I only am taking away one star because I think they need to send a box for shipping out the phones rather than a padded envelope.

Review.Titre: Bait and switch on price. But fast return.
Review.Contenu: Bait and switch on price. But they will increase their offer considerably if you request returning the item. Overall fast process and return to me even If I didn't sell my phone to them.

Review.Titre: Bait and switch on buyback price…
Review.Contenu: They said my cell had screen scratches and I had taken photos of the cell before shipping. It had no scratches anywhere. It had a screen protector glass on it from date purchased at Verizon and I sent it to them in original box.  They lied to chew my buyback price down 20 dollars. Bait and switch.

A website that's easy to navigate. Customer service department that is top notch. Along with reasonable cash offers for used electronics.I might not always agree with their grading of items I've sold to them, they are a legit business that you can use without hesitation.

Review.Titre: Great experience but not the best payout..
Review.Contenu: Not the best payout compared to other competitors on the market, but they do a great job at a lot of things! Instant customer service response, packaging and sending the phone was a breeze, payout was also easy! I gave them 4/5 because I don’t think any phone will ever be under the flawless bracket unless you bought it like a month ago. Mine had very very light and tiny scratches near the charging port from using the phone, you couldn’t see them on the stainless steel of the iPhone unless put under the right light. I got offered an amount between the good and flawless bracket (closer to the latter). I am 100% sure my phone would be sold under Renewed Premium category on Amazon for 250$ more, so I could have gotten atleast 50$ more out of it from them. I had to accept because I deemed it was not worth the hassle to sell it myself and also because as soon as the new iPhone released all websites decreased their trade-in prices.

My experience with buybackboss was very good. Communication was very good. Once things got started  the process went very good. There was a couple of things I would change but then that's just me. If your phone would get lost or stolen there is no coverage which would not bother most people but me It did. The customer service phone no's would not work. No sense in having them if they don't work.  But everything overall went very well. Thank you.

Review.Titre: smooth overall but price was less
Review.Contenu: It was a smooth process and the service reps are helpful. My only issue is that I sent in 2 iPhones that were in flawless condition. One was mine, the other my wife’s. My wife NEVER took her phone out of the case and yet somehow when they got it it had a bunch of scratches on the sides that now made it lower quality. I had no way to fight this as I did not have pics of the phone before I sent it, and didn’t think about it until afterwards I should had them confirm it was the right phone! It probably wasn’t! Lesson learned to take pictures of my phone before sending it in. It just felt a bit scammy.

Buyback Boss bought my used iPhone!!!   They made me an offer, I accepted, they sent me a mailing label.   Constant communication, took them 5 days to test my phone, then offered me $40 less than offered.   My phone was like new, the representative at our new phone company suggested I sell rather than trade because it was in great shape…..flawless!!!   But it was 4 years old and they detected faint scratches.     At this point you are committed or I was….accepted their offer, money was deposited directly to my bank account.    It couldn’t have been easier but I suggest you get in-person offers as well as on-line just to cover your bases.    I gave it a solid 4.

The process was frustration free. The only thing I didn't like was you deducted $10 from the original offer because you said the phone had scratches and signs of wear. It was always in a case from day one and I inspected it closely, so I disagreed with your assessment.

Great communications team; professional, friendly and timely.  I think they are too conservative on how they evaluate used phone quality, so I don't think I quite get what they're worth, but they aren't unreasonable.

Review.Titre: Customer service good, offer not so much.
Review.Contenu: Customer service was very good.The buyback rates were lower than expected considering the phones were all in very good condition.  They were very not picky on even the smallest blemishes which had nothing to do with the functions.The website quote and actual offer were miles apart, not just a little bit.

Review.Titre: Quick and easy to deal with
Review.Contenu: Quick and easy to deal withI'm happy with the phone and the deal I got from the company. I wanted a good smartphone that did the basics, and the site recommended one that ticked all the boxes. Speaking with the service team helped me get exactly what I was looking for.The only reason not to give 5 stars is the fact that I had to separately claim for the offered cash back deal, rather than it being automatic, and this info wasn't stated anywhere.Thank you for an awesome service .

My experience with Buyback Boss...Has been life-saving and swift....Customer service was informative and consistence with updates regarding my phone.Payment expedited once my phone was completed for its worth.Will use again with on my electronics.

Review.Titre: I thought the assessment of my iPad was…
Review.Contenu: I initially thought the assessment of my iPad was inaccurate and seemed to be prepared by the company to make you feel like your device is not worth very much. After a a fair reassessment of my device, which included a video, a higher offer for my device was made and they went out of their way to make me feel better about my experience.

I sent in my iPad based on a specific quote but when they reviewed it they quoted me a lower amount because they said that there were scratches on it. There were no scratches on the device and I disputed it and asked them to send it back if they couldn’t give the original quoted price. They then agreed that there were no scratches and give me the original quoted amount

Review.Titre: The process took longer than expected
Review.Contenu: The process took longer than expected, but I got $50 more for the phone I sold. Payment was made electronically into my given bank account. Pretty good experience overall.

Review.Titre: The staff was extremely helpful and…
Review.Contenu: The staff was extremely helpful and supportive.  The pricing was extremely competitive and the process was pretty simple.  The only reason they didn't get 5 stars was the tracking feature on the website wasn't working.
Honest evaluation, payment took longer than I was accustomed to but went through at the end of their time frame. Helpful service and fast response time.

Review.Titre: I was a little disappointed in how much…
Review.Contenu: I was a little disappointed in how much I received, but appreciated the honesty and sincerity of those evaluating my phone. I believe I got a fair price considering the phones issue. I would definitely use this service again.
Equipment took a bit to get to the location because of some error on address but once it got resolved Skye provided excellent service and answered all my questions promptly.
It was my 2nd experience of selling device to them and team of Kiara and others did excellent job
Easy to use, but it took quite awhile from sending the phone until I received the check. But it did indeed come, and for the expected amount.
Phone was immaculate but was dinged on scratches which I apparently am unable to see. It was on $20 less than quote which is still okay.

Review.Titre: Relatively easy to work with and…
Review.Contenu: Relatively easy to work with and ultimately got a fair price which is what I was looking for.
Got a decent price for an iPhone 8. Minus 1 star for the hounding emails and texts when I didn't ship for a couple of days. I'm busy, I got to it when I could.
Was quick and easy. Would have been 5 stars, but I didn’t receive the amount that I thought they were worth.

Review.Titre: i like that they are willing to work…
Review.Contenu: i like that they are willing to work with you with pricing

Review.Titre: The transaction is good and the credit…
Review.Contenu: The transaction is good and the credit is recognized.

Review.Titre: Best price a bit over offered and…
Review.Contenu: Best price a bit over offered and reduced a bit after they received two phones in great shape with very minor scratches and small dents. Both have full covered hard cases since new, Final price fair. Excellent communication during entire process. I will do business with them again.

Review.Titre: Quick response and the check was sent…
Review.Contenu: Quick response and the check was sent right after they checked the phone out.

Review.Titre: My iPhone 13 Pro Max - little lie…not the best
Review.Contenu: My iPhone 13 Pro Max was in awesome condition. When they received they stated it had scratches on wire port. However, I took pictures prior to sending it to them. No scratches on wire port. I would alway charge my phone wirelessly too. Would of used Gazelle for the price they gave me after but was already shipped out. Won’t use them again.

Review.Titre: Good but they need more payment options
Review.Contenu: Gave me $4 underneath what I was quoted which was totally reasonable. Very communicative, sent check within about 4 days of getting the iPhone, and I received the check about 9 days from the date I sent it in. Check cleared. Everything went smooth. Can get funds faster if you choose electronic instead, but I don’t fock with PayPal’s sorry a**. They should do Venmo and direct deposit. That’s why I’m giving them 4 stars only. It took a little too long.

The process was extremely straightforward. I would have liked to see a little more transparency in the company’s classifications of quality. However, when I questioned this I was met with courtesy and clarity. 4/5, would have been a 5/5 had I gotten a little more money 😁

Review.Titre: Buyback Boss is easy to work with
Review.Contenu: Buyback Boss is easy to work with, great communications and is quick to answer your questions. I gave them a four only because we received less money than expected.  They rated our phone quality lower than I did and although I didn’t agree, I accepted the payment because it was less hassle then having to start the process all over again with another company.

Review.Titre: Ok in the end, but not great
Review.Contenu: I got a reasonable price for my iPhone 11 Pro, although I had to contact them because their max promise of 6 days had gone by after they received the phone and I had not received any notice of my payment.  Also, they marked the value of my phone as "fair" and gave me $100 less than the original quote even though there was not a single scratch on the phone or glass (I always used a protective cover).

Review.Titre: Had a good experience with this…
Review.Contenu: Had a good experience with this company. got slightly less than i had hoped for . i understand that i am not able to know all the answers to there questions like battery life , maybe a step by step tutorial of the questions you want answered. year, model, battery life etc. i am very glad it worked well as other companies didn't have good reviews. BB have constant contact with me.

They were a pleasure to deal with.  They sent a box & kept me informed along the way. The check was prompt.I was disappointed that they found scratches on both phones I sold & lowered the amount they paid me. We kept them covered in protective cases & used screen protectors.  I would sell phones to them in the future.

Review.Titre: My phone was down graded from excellent…
Review.Contenu: My phone was down graded from excellent to good and offered an amount lower than what was on the website. When I brought it to customer service they said there was a mistake and I was given the correct amount. I didn’t like the fact that your quoted price can change from the date of quote to when the phone is actually examined. I didn’t see that when I got my quote and feel that is deceptive.

Review.Titre: The process was simple and quick, but...
Review.Contenu: The process was simple and quick.  They contacted me saying they were knocking $20 off their original offer.  I asked them why and they responded by saying there was a scratch on the rear camera, which simply couldn't have been true because I know there was still OEM plastic screen protector on it.  However, after going through the entire process it was still worth it in the end.

Review.Titre: Great except for the need to question the initial condition assessment
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased to get $90 for my Samsung S8 in excellent condition. I took off one star, because initially i was told the phone had a crack and I would only get $20. I questioned that and asked for a photo, and they quickly replied offering the full amount. It made me skeptical that they may have mixed my phone up with another, but the full dollar amount is what mattered the most, and the rest of the process was seamless. Thank you!

Mostly good experience! I was disappointed that they said the phone was damaged because of the battery life. We checked that before sending it and their assessment did not match what we thought. Either way we feel like we got a good deal selling our phone this way. Would send other used electronics to them in the future. Customer service was great!

I sent in a phone that was in working condition and had cracks on each side of my iPhone 8+. I was estimated $130 and sent in my phone. They ended up considering it “broken” and advised the LED screen was broken and were only willing to issue $92. I am not a phone expert by any means, but there were only cracks on this phone. Not 100% sure I agree with the estimate. Otherwise, the payment was issued very fast.

Didn’t get what I was originally quoted, due to the frame of the phone and screen being bent that I hadn’t noticed during use or when sending in for payment. Took some negotiation to get what I felt was a fair value for the phone once the condition was updated, but overall their customer service provided helpful proof of the damage and still paid more for the phone than other sites I was looking at would have provided, even after lowering their offer.

Legitimate company. The initial Buyback Boss offer was less than what was quoted online. Thus, I cannot give 5 stars. Also, the initial offer was an extreme low ball, but then I countered and we met in the middle. That's okay and I received my check promptly, but I would have preferred no negotiation and the highest possible offer the first time.

I sent my phone to BuyBack Boss because Gazelle would not accept it because it was too old. It was an iPhone 5s. (I have sold every other phone back to Gazelle.) When they received it, apparently the phone was still locked. The tech reached out to me directly and gave me options on how I could get it unlocked. We were quickly able to get it done. While it was unfortunate they dropped the quoted price, which hasn't happened with Gazelle, I was impressed with the company, and I would work with them again.

Easy and Fast.  A little bit of a delay in receiving payment, but that was due to the holidays.  Also, a little disappointment in my items being downgraded from Mint condition to Used, which decreased my quote.  Not sure why? Kinda feel like that was a bait and switch tactic.  Nevertheless, I will use BuybackBoss again in the future, they were very responsive and the process was easy to do and I was still pleased with the results.

Review.Titre: Thanks for being so rock solid
Review.Contenu: Thanks for being so rock solid. Leanne C. Was my contact, and she did an excellent job, particularly in the communication of the condition of the devices, as well as how to properly troubleshoot when she couldn't unlock a few cell phones. I would recommend giving her a raise or promotion, y'all would be smart to keep her around. Keep on keeping on.

Review.Titre: They did not set the right pricing…
Review.Contenu: They did not set the right pricing expectations when submitting the phone for recycle.  Originally $55 but when they got it they said $10.  Bait and switch.Came back and offered to make it right and verified that they would update the "broken" section to have more details for accurate quote.

Review.Titre: Sold a couple phones just sitting…
Review.Contenu: Sold a couple phones just sitting around in my house. I got what was quoted for one and was told the second one was accessed at a lower value upon inspection. After requesting that they look again we both came to an agreement on value of the phone and I agreed to the new price. The money was sent via Pay Pal and it took a total of about 7 days. I was very happy with the service and the time it took from start to finish. I will use this service again for sure.

Review.Titre: No update emails, but check came
Review.Contenu: My personal experience was this, i sent my phone in and chose to receive a check. About 2 weeks went by and i didnt get an email or anything saying  that they have recieved my phone or anything. And then i had a check in the mail for the agreed price. So i didnt get any confirmation or updates about my phone while waiting, but it all worked out how it was supposed to in the end so i really have no complaints.

Buyback Boss was easy to work with, direct and uncomplicated.  They gave me a significantly better offer for my broken phone than 4 other companies I checked into-but more impressively, when I didn’t receive my check as expected, they immediately corrected it and issued a new check within about 12 hours of my complaint.  Customer service reps were prompt and polite.  Payment has now been received and I’ve already recommended Buyback Boss to others.

They were communicative and quoted me the price that was displayed on their site. If for any reason you need to get ahold of them, they were quick to respond assess the issue; they also make sure that you are willing to go through with the offer just in case you are being quoted differently due to the standing condition of your phone.

Bad communicationThis is clearly not the experience that others have had, but I have had to wait 3 days between most email communications when trying to sell my laptop. This was emailing with Jay L. I'm going to submit another request to see if I can get linked with a different customer experience rep.Update: I got an email from a different rep, who explained to me what was going on behind the scenes. She assured me that future communication would not take longer than 24 hours during normal business days. Altogether, they seem like a reputable group.

The team had excellent customer service and answered all of my questions and concerns. Unfortunately, my phone was quoted much higher than the actual end price (due to an apparent screen issue?), so that was pretty disappointing. Otherwise a positive experience.

The estimate was accurate, the send back process was simple.  Lost a star because they somehow processed my return but forgot to send the check to me. They immediately rectified the issue when it was brought to their attention.  But, I'd recommend following up with them about a week after putting the device in the mail.

Great experience! I just wish they would send a picture when they reduce your money. They said the screen was separating but it was just fine when I sent it. It was only a few dollars so not a big deal. Service was overall excellent!

Review.Titre: Good communications from end to end
Review.Contenu: Good communications from end to end.  My refund was decreased due to their measurement of wear.  At my request pictures were shared with me display the wear.  While I have NO REASON to believe the pictures weren't accurate; lessons learned- take your own pictures before you send off a device to ANY company (for service, for refund, etc.).  The reduction of refund wasn't enough to decide not to go forward.  Payment credit to my Paypal account was quick.  Shipping process was uneventful.

I was extremely leery at first about this process. They quoted me a price based on my review of the condition of the phone. When they received it, they sent me an email saying that the battery life wasn't sufficient enough and offered me a low-ball price. They did accept my counter offer since the phone was in pristine condition. I appreciated their back & forth communication on everything. I would recommend Buyback Boss to others and will consider selling to them in the future.

Review.Titre: Buyback Boss was super helpful in…
Review.Contenu: Buyback Boss was super helpful in making sure I understood the process and offering proactive customer support. They gave updates along the way while my phone was on transit, and actually gave me more money than the original quote after receiving my phone. Great to work with!

Communication was very good throughout the process. They lose a star as the inspection took a long time, considerably longer than other similar companies which have managed to have a phone inspected within 2 days of receipt. Because of that, the money took a while but did eventually arrive as advertised.

Review.Titre: had doubts now i have cash, i was sussed out at first too.
Review.Contenu: my phone was straight up destroyed. Yet i was still skeptical, can i maybe turn it into one of those machines or maybe gamestop?do i really want to send my phone off to some random a ss address in Arizona?I decided, f uck it, worst case scenario my busted a ss phone gets stolen. Turns out they're completely legit. they gave me a lot of scripted lines to some of my questions but i got paid. this is not a scam. they will pay you for your stuff within about 1.5 weeks. i went with Paypal and when she said "you will be paid today" i got paid.

Review.Titre: I've used them now a couple of times
Review.Contenu: I've used them now a couple of times. This time I asked for a price match. They agreed (yeah!) then I got the check and it wasn't match. No worries, some glitch happened, and they fixed it right away and sent it right now. Very happy with the quick turnaround

Review.Titre: They pay quickly but undervalue your…
Review.Contenu: They pay quickly but undervalue your merchandise compared to other resellers. Their website is pretty good allowing you to sell multiple devices in one transaction. In this case, this place is good for fast cash. You're paying for convenience.

The process to trade in my iPhone X was quick and easy, and I received my compensation in less than 5 business days. The only thing that I wish I knew was that there would be fees deducted from the trade-in quote once processed via PayPal, but other than that, no complaints!

This was my first experience with this company.  After a brief pause, the email with my adjusted offer was corrected.  I chose to accept the revised yet somewhat lower offer out of convivence due to my health.

Review.Titre: Had a rough start but Kevin fixed everything
Review.Contenu: Had a rough start with the company and the quote I was given but after extensive talking with Kevin from customer service he has changed my whole outlook on this company offered me more money for the inconvenience shows me that the company does care about its customers overall I give it 4 stars out of 5 for its fast response good customer service and a willing to please the customer want to give an extra thank you to Kevin who has changed my whole outlook on the company good job Kevin

I recently sold an iPhone 6s Plus. Came across Buyback Boss after months of research. Unlocked, Factory Refurbished & in very good condition, considering it was encased since delivery day. I understand depreciation but I was hoping to get at least half of what I originally paid. I would have but due to a tiny screen crack I was unaware of, my quote was lowered significantly. Disappointing but at least the staff I spoke with is nice, they sent me a labeled box and provided a promo code. I'll recommend and sell to them in the future.

Review.Titre: After sending in my phone I received an …
Review.Contenu: After sending in my phone I received an email saying they were decreasing my offer greatly because they thought my phone as still under contract and payments were still owed. After I  responded that this was not correct, they emailed me that I was right and then paid me full offer amount. Also, I did not realize that PayPal takes a fee from my payment. It was not explained on the buyback boss website. Other than that, they offered me the most for my phone and had great customer service throughout the process.

It was oh so easy- they told me how much they would pay for my phone in the condition it was in, and they sent me a prepaid mailing label. I wrapped it up and sent it off, and in a few days the $$ appeared in my PayPal account. I was surprised that they deducted a fee of some kind. So instead of $12 for my iPhone 5s with a cracked screen, I got $11 and some change. Always “fees”. Coming or going. But I was just glad to get rid of it, and not have it lying around in my drawer for years. And hopefully have it recycled.

Review.Titre: Great company even better customer service.
Review.Contenu: Experience was a little rough at first. I would definitely recommend using this company. I have no words for how amazing Brittany has been throughout this process. I am one of those people that can be won over by excellent customer service. This company definitely deserves a shot at your business.

Review.Titre: The online service people were Great!
Review.Contenu: The online service people were there for me from the very beginning.  I appreciate the personal touch that they made me feel as I navigated untold territories with this new age things.  Thank you

Review.Titre: This is an updated review to my original review
Review.Contenu: This is a update to my original review.  After having a issue with the quoted amount i was given i was contacted by Michael and after speaking to him he gave me an acceptable amount. Great customer serice. Thank you Michael.

Would like to give 5 stars, but unfortunately that is not possible. While they did finally honor their original quote it took effort & time on my end to get the full price I had been promised. First it was condition. My phone had a screen protector and full cover. The "damage" was residue that wiped off. Second, I had inquired about being on Xfinity before sending them my phone. Their customer service assured me it would be treated as a Verizon phone. But upon receipt they said it was considered "other". I had to show them the proof to get that resolved. Took a few days and emails, but they did pay promised price.

works as describedEverything was smooth and worked as described.  The only thing that caught me off guard was that if you asked to be paid via PayPal there is a $12 fee.  So if you are not in a hurry go with the check option to get the full amount quoted

Review.Titre: My only issue is that all my…
Review.Contenu: My only issue is that all my communications with them via text or direct email we’re fine. It is when they sent an email with my offer that it went to my junk email folder. They were very responsive and I got a good price for my phone.

The team was very communicative.  The price match was very easy to do as well.  While I was a bit disappointed that one of my devices ended up getting a lower price due to a small mark on the LCD, the team was still great about the entire process.

Buyback Boss was very easy to work with and very responsive to questions. I gave them a four because I received less money than expected because they rated my phone quality lower than I did and I didn’t agree.

Review.Titre: While I feel the device is worth more…
Review.Contenu: While I feel the device is worth more than offered, BBB did pay me as they promised, after downgrading the condition, then deducting an additional $2.00, which I do not understand.

Review.Titre: buyback boss is a king of all
Everything went fine until some guy got…
Review.Contenu: Everything went fine until some guy got involved who was clueless about my transaction which was probably halfway completed by that time. I do believe he delayed it by a day or two. I would however use you again and recommend you to friends

Review.Titre: What you see is almost what you get
Review.Contenu: Got my initial quote, was higher than others and took it. They responded about 5-7 days later letting me know one phone had scratches from the phone case so they lowered the quote on the second phone. Decent experience would use again.

Review.Titre: Initially some condition description issues, but the customer service superseded this
Review.Contenu: Communication was great w/ timely responses. The descriptions of phone/device conditions was initially a bit deceiving/lacking, but I was pointed to a more thorough explanation after the fact which helped

Great service they got in touch with me when my Apple ID was still connected to the phone and after servers tries talked me through how to remove it. They sent the check soon after. I was happy to get sixty bucks for two phones that didn't work.

Review.Titre: I got more than originally quoted
Review.Contenu: I got more than originally quoted! I only gave 4 stars because they said the check was in the mail and it did not get sent out. After I realized it had been too long I emailed customer service and they took care of it right away!

Review.Titre: I didn’t like the part that they said…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t like the part that they said my battery was defect or it was working at 80 percent so the lowered the price from 115 to 85 dollars what do the expect for a iPhone seven plus in the 2020 really!

I was very impressed with communication and ongoing updates. I was disappointed in the final amount I got for my cell phone. (They considered a battery with a poor charge “damaged”. ) Otherwise, very professional.
Highly skeptical at first, I didn't like the interaction with the tech. However, once connected with the customer satisfaction team it became a great experiance.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased that they were…
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased that they were willing to buy our 2 cell phones... one of which was totally non-functioning.  And the played for the mailing of them as well.  Good also they are recycled versus going in a dump.
Easy process to setup and send the old phones in. They were in constant communication giving me status updates. Once everything was squared away the payment was sent out and received quickly.
The process was pretty smooth. It took a little to get to me. But I wasn’t sure if it was because the thanksgiving holiday or just overflow. Other than that, it was a pretty smooth transition

Communication was great, and friendly to boot.  I would highly recommend taking detailed pictures of the items you are sending in BEFORE you send them in.  Once Buyback Boss has your items, they can grade them however they want and it is your word against theirs, and having possession gives them the upper hand.  I sent in 2 items, 1 which was nearly flawless and they cut the amount I expected to get in half.  The second item I sent arrived with a damaged screen, it was not damaged when it left, that item went from $15 to $1.  I would use them again, but I would cover myself better knowing what I know now.*UPDATE*Buyback Boss contacted me to resolve my above issue and share that they are making updates to their quoting process.  Nice to see that Buyback Boss is listening to customers and making changes where needed.  Updated my rating from 2 to 4 stars.

I thought my iPhone 5 was in pristine condition. Buyback Boss reported they found some scratches I didn't see. I had the option of taking the phone back or accepting a lower price. I accepted their judgement.

Review.Titre: Buyback is Fair in their Dealings
Review.Contenu: Use caution!   I sent a iPhone in mint condition and they downgraded it to fair.  A typical bait and switch.  My advice is to sell local and face to face.Update:  After trading emails, Buyback Boss made my transaction right and sent me the agreed upon price.  I believe my phone was in mint condition and scratch free.  I was sent a picture of my phone with a scratch on the screen which I certainly do not recall. Unfortunately, I did not take a picture prior to mailing my old phone.  Nevertheless, Buyback Boss did agree to pay me mint condition price. I commend them for paying me a fair price.  Overall the communication and entire process was good. I truly believe they received a phone in mint condition and that I received a fair price!  Thank you!
Very responsive and honest.  Didn’t get what I hoped to get from one of my iPhones, but they were fair and willing to negotiate and meet in the middle. I will definitely do business with them again.

Review.Titre: I sent my phone to this company they…
Review.Contenu: Buybackboos resolved my issues and did the right thing.  I would recomend them at this time.  I have removed my initial rating of one star and I've removed my initial comments and updated with this.

Review.Titre: Offered a good price for my old phone
Review.Contenu: Offered a good price for my old phone.  They kept in contact with me, letting me know as the process moved along.  Would recommend to anyone looking to get a lil money from old phone.

Review.Titre: This service was great but more emails would be better.
Review.Contenu: This service was great but more attention to customer for tracking device when shipped and when received.Maybe it’s slower because of COVID-19 but took longer than advertised.
Employees were very thorough and helpful. Communication was perfect and understandable. Very professional.
So, I’ve never done anything like this before, I had limited expectations but these guys come highly recommend. It was absolutely painless and pretty quick. Very good experience.

Review.Titre: Fast process and turn around on Payback.
Review.Contenu: Fast process and turn around on Payback.  Just wish there was a review of label before accepted or option to change after because I had a typo. Otherwise, good help and relatively easy process.

Excellent experience! This was my first time using Buyback Boss to sell my used iPad Pro. They were quick to respond to my concerns, and the communication and service was excellent. Would not hesitate to do business with them again.

Review.Titre: Paid what they quoted me for
Review.Contenu: Paid what they quoted me for. Also received shipping material which is a plus. Payments and shipments were all on time. Will highly recommend the service.

So easy! Seemed too good to be true, but it wasn't. I submitted my phone as in "good" condition because I was worried flawless was too far fetched but they emailed me and said after review it was flawless and offered me MORE money than for good. They totally could have kept it as good, but they didn't and they absolutely earned my trust. Would recommend!

Review.Titre: It really is a pleasure to do business with BuyBack Boss
Review.Contenu: This is the second time I have sold electronic gear to Buyback Boss. It was effortless and easy to work with them. I sent the item to them and in less that a week I received an email with the link to claim my gift card. I my opinion they are generous with the amount offered for the items I sold them. I recommend them very highly!

Review.Titre: Great experience selling my old iPhone
Review.Contenu: I recently replaced my iPhone SE (2nd generation). Apple offered $80, Gazelle offered around $72. A web search found several places that offered more, with Buyback Boss, which I had never heard of before, leading the field at $112 for what I described as Good condition. I sent it in postage-paid using their mailing label. Imagine my surprise when, several days after they received it, they said it's actually in Flawless condition and they were sending my $146! I just received payment today, and I absolutely recommend them.

Review.Titre: Great price offer and smooth process in selling my iPhone
Review.Contenu: I sold my iPhone 13 to BuybackBoss. The offer was good so I went ahead with it. As soon as I submitted my order, they sent me the packing label and assigned a liaison contact. I had a couple of questions that were answered promptly and to my satisfaction. Settlement was as promised, no issues faced at all! It did take them 3-4 days to process after receiving the phone, but that I think is understandable, given higher trade-in volumes during this time of the year. Overall, a great experience.

I’m very happy with my experience with Buyback Boss. I received the mailer promptly and was notified every step of the way. They paid quickly and I received more than the estimate. I have another item to sell and I will definitely be using Buyback Boss.
Outstanding customer service, very fair price and speedy service on my buyback! I highly recommend!!

Review.Titre: Great and competitive offer and quick payout
Review.Contenu: Great and competitive offer. They send you all the material and postage to send your device over to them. Their customer support via text is awesome. They pay very quickly. Second time I have done business with them. They are great each time.

Family got a set of new phones and were looking to unload of our iPhone 12’s. Shopped around and found these guys to offer a fair price. The difference maker for me was the simple and seamless process. 100% recommend

Review.Titre: The title of their company is true
Review.Contenu: I've used them once.. A competitive company that pays very well for used electronics. Was sent a prepaid shipping label. Packaged my phone and sent it to them. They were very prompt with sending the updates, and asking If I had any questions. Upon receiving my phone, they paid me through PayPal within a week. I definitely recommend this legit company
Great Company. I've sold 2 Iphones to them in the past couple years. They are fast and paid the amount quoted.

Review.Titre: Quick response to solve the problem
Review.Contenu: Quick response to solve the problem and made the payment very fast!

Review.Titre: Kiara made this experience great by her…
Review.Contenu: Kiara made this experience great by her timely responses, and when I felt that the condition of my phone was higher than the intial offer, they granted my request fairly and objectively, which makes me feel like their not trying to rip people off. Thank you Kiara for your help! Payment was fairly quick too!

First time that I have ever sold a used iPhone (or any other electronic device). I was pleasantly surprised by how easy Buyback Boss made the entire process. And after receiving/inspecting the iPhone, they paid me the full amount quoted.

Review.Titre: I was given higher amount than quote…
Review.Contenu: I was given higher amount than quote because they found my xs max is in better condition than described

Start to finish it took 7 days to complete- send your phone with free shipping label then less than 5 days later, money is available. The money was less than the original estimate buy back price but that was to be expected. Great communication throughout the process, highly recommend.
It was a very easy process and the people at buyback were very easy to deal with.

Quick processing time, from sending in device to payment. I would recommend using the bank transfer option, got my money within a day after! Paypal in my opinion is a not a good option, because of the fees it charges. Buyback boss has very good customer service, was skeptical about selling my phone this way! I would recommend their service and use it myself again in the future:)

Very straightforward process that is based on the sellor providing an honest appraisal of their electronic device being proffered.  I will be using them again in the future when we have devices to sell. Everybody was very helpful and consumer oriented that we dealt with during the sales process.

Review.Titre: Buyback Boss has been my go to when I…
Review.Contenu: Buyback Boss has been my go to when I need to sell my phones I have sold two of my phones and is always fast and easy I love how fast they answer to you’re emails when you have any questions. Michael has been amazing trough out my process of selling them my phones.

It’s such an easy and seamless process! It’s my third time using this company and I’ve never had an issue. I’m impressed that even when I though my phone may be in a worse condition, the company is honest and gave it a better rating/more money!
I have used many other buyback platforms over the years and none compare to buyback boss. They are the best by far! Highly recommend. Thank you Buyback Boss for the exceptional experience!

Review.Titre: My daughter found this site when we…
Review.Contenu: My daughter found this site when we decided to sell our old cell phones after getting new ones through a promotion.  It was so easy and straight forward that I decided to give it a try.  The quote they gave me was only a few dollars less than they quoted before seeing the phone so I excepted it and within a day or two had my money in the bank.  Keep up the good work and thanks, Ohawk52, Albany

This is the second time using BuyBackBoss and I definitely recommend them over trading in using Gazelle.  They are very professional and communicate with you every step of the way.  I’ve tried smaller (lesser known firms than the big trade in firms) as they often give better deals but it also feels like a mom-n-pop experience where you mail it in and hope everything goes well. With BuyBackBoss, I got a great trade in, no hassle and I would use again!

Review.Titre: I had the best experience with Buyback Boss.
Review.Contenu: This was my first experience using an online buyback service. The customer service was excellent and everything processed exactly as indicated on the site. I am recommending this option to my friends and co-wokers and will use them for all of my future needs.

Buyback Boss was simply wonderful! What made them wonderful? Besides being very secure and quick in payment, I had a question when an an issue arose. They not not only responded right away all they cared about was making me (their customer) happy! That just just doesn’t happen anymore. They were a pleasure to work with. Thank you!

Review.Titre: They delivered as promised…unusual these days.
Review.Contenu: The person I corresponded with via email was polite, nice, and explained exactly what would happen and when.  My actual payment matched the estimate I was given initially.  This company delivered as promised and advertised.  It was a true pleasure having a company do what they said.

Review.Titre: Buyback Boss paid me top dollar for my…
Review.Contenu: Buyback Boss paid me top dollar for my old phone and WELL ABOVE what the local kiosks pay. As soon as they received my phone, they inspected it and issued my payment. Fast, convenient and top dollar paid for old electronics that were gathering dust. I absolutely recommend Buyback Boss!

Review.Titre: I've been using Buyback Boss for over a…
Review.Contenu: I've been using Buyback Boss for over a year now and they're the best I've used so far! The entire process is seamless and they are very good with status updates on your order. They're very honest with their evaluation and even adjust their value if the item you're selling is in better condition. 10/10 would recommended to others.

Sent in my iPhone - which had a cracked screen so I wasn’t going to get any money from Apple - and ended up getting the exact amount they promised me when I sent it in, which I felt was generous. Very impressed with the speed and ease at which it happened. I would use again & have already recommended to family and friends.

However, I simply made a counter about halfway between the two figures and it was accepted without contest. I got my money very fast through rewards@tremendous which is the digital check option.  I will definitely use again.
